# Landscaping Services Tender

## Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4543347061-Document 4569049553
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4543347061
* **Publication Date**: May 31, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 19, 2024, at 14:00 EDT

## Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 11, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 24, 2027
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), etc. (Please refer to the attached solicitation documents for a complete list.)

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide landscaping services for the Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Cold Lake. The scope of work includes all labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for landscaping services, as and when required.

## Important Deadlines

* **Tender Submission Deadline**: June 19, 2024, at 14:00 EDT
* **Non-Responsive Bid Declaration**: Bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

* Phone: (Please call according to service hours)
* Location: Department of Public Works and Government Services, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
